name: Permanent Affordable Supportive Housing
description: Providing 50 units of permanent supportive housing including 25 units dedicated to transitional-aged youth exiting the foster care system.
fullDescription: Providing 50 units of permanent supportive housing including 25 units dedicated to transitional-aged youth exiting the foster care system.
whatTheyOffer: Providing 50 units of permanent supportive housing including 25 units dedicated to transitional-aged youth exiting the foster care system.
howToGetIt: For more information or to sign up, email rbabbit@btwcsc.org or call 415-928-6596.
